file.name: swagger.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Bashoutter API
  version: 0.1.0
  description: https://gitlab.com/tomomano/intro-aws

paths:
  /haiku:
    get:
      summary: Get a list of haiku
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    item_id:
                      type: string
                    username:
                      type: string
                    first:
                      type: string
                    second:
                      type: string
                    third:
                      type: string
                    likes:
                      type: integer
                    created_at:
                      type: string
                      format: date-time
    post:
      summary: Post a new haiku
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                username:
                  type: string
                first:
                  type: string
                second:
                  type: string
                third:
                  type: string
      responses:
        201:
          description: OK
  /haiku/{item_id}:
    parameters:
      - in: path
        name: item_id
        required: true
        description: ID of the selected haiku
        schema:
          type: string
    patch:
      summary: Add like to a selected haiku
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
    delete:
      summary: Delete a haiku
      responses:
        204:
          description: Resource deleted successfully
